disabled.docs:
**, boolean**: Set to true to disable mDNS usage. Defaults to false.

*See also: [mDNS Component](https://esphome.io/components/mdns.html#configuration-variables)*

services.docs:
**, list**: List of additional services to expose.
  * **service** (**Required**, string): Name of extra service.
  
  * **protocol** (**Required**, string): Protocol of service (_udp or _tcp).
  
  * **port** (*Optional*, [templatable](https://esphome.io/automations/templates.html#config-templatable), int): Port number of extra service.
  
  * **txt** (*Optional*, mapping): Additional text records to add to service. Values are [templatable](https://esphome.io/automations/templates.html#config-templatable).
  
  

*See also: [mDNS Component](https://esphome.io/components/mdns.html#configuration-variables)*
